title: What Is Candy Salad? Recipe Ideas, Serving Tips, & More

steps.title: Choose your candies, pour them into a serving bowl, and that’s it!
steps.content: Choose your candies, pour them into a serving bowl, and that’s it! One of the things that makes candy salad so great is how customizable it is, so don’t be afraid to get creative. You have the freedom to add whatever candies you like, leave out any candies you’re not a fan of, and invent your own unique combinations. If you’re not quite sure what to add, here’s are some standard candy salad ingredients to inspire you: [1] X Research source Sour Patch Watermelon Sour Punch Bites Mini Starbursts Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers Nerds Gummy Clusters Twizzlers Bites Peach Rings Gummy Bears

steps.title: Chocolate Candy Salad
steps.content: Chocolate Candy Salad If you’re looking for a decadent option, a chocolate candy salad may be perfect for you. [2] X Research source To make chocolate candy salad, add your favorite chocolate candies and mini chocolate bars (after taking them out of their wrappers). For example, you could add: Mini Hershey’s bars Mini KitKats Mini Snickers bars Mini Twix bars Hershey’s kisses M&Ms

steps.title: Reese’s Peanut Butter Candy Salad
steps.content: Reese’s Peanut Butter Candy Salad This is a more specific take on a chocolate candy salad that’s perfect for peanut butter lovers. Just grab all the mini Reese’s candies you can find at the store, along with any other candies you like that contain peanuts and chocolate. [3] X Research source Unwrap them and toss them into a bowl, then enjoy! Options to add include: Miniature Reese’s Cups Reese’s Pieces Mini Reese’s Take 5 Bars Peanut Butter M&Ms Peanut M&Ms

steps.title: Super Sour Candy Salad
steps.content: Super Sour Candy Salad If you’re a fan of sour foods, try going all out and making a candy salad exclusively with sour candies. [4] X Research source This would be a fun one to try with friends, too–you can challenge each other to see who can handle all the sour candy the best. Here’s a sample recipe to inspire you: Sour Patch Kids Sour Patch Watermelon Sour Punch Bites Warheads Lemonheads Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers Sour Skittles

steps.title: Color-Themed Candy Salad
steps.content: Color-Themed Candy Salad If you’re making a candy salad for a party or event, try picking candies that are the same color as your decor. For example, if the decor of your party is pink, you could make a candy salad including: All Pink Mini Starburst Twizzlers Bites Sour Patch Watermelon Red Sour Punch Bites Swedish Fish Pink Jelly Beans Red and White Gummy Bears

steps.title: Holiday-Themed Candy Salad
steps.content: Holiday-Themed Candy Salad For a candy salad you’re planning on serving around a holiday, consider picking candies with flavors or colors that would go along nicely with the season. For example: Christmas Candy Salad: Choose red and green candies and incorporate festive treats like peppermint-flavored sweets or gumdrops. Halloween Candy Salad: Choose orange, green, and purple candies, and include classics like candy corn and Reese’s pumpkins. Fourth of July Candy Salad: Opt for red, white, and blue colored gummies and candies.

steps.title: Clashing flavors
steps.content: Clashing flavors When you’re making your candy salad, pick flavors that will mesh well and complement each other, and try to avoid flavors that clash. For example, chocolate candies may not blend very well with sour gummies, so it’s best to pick one or the other. [5] X Research source However, some people don’t mind very different flavors being in the same candy bucket, and that’s fine, too. The most important thing is that you enjoy the candy salad you make, so if you want to be creative and mix some interesting flavors, go for it!

steps.title: Individually wrapped candies
steps.content: Individually wrapped candies For the most part, it’s best to include only unwrapped candy in your candy salad recipe. Unwrapped candy is easier to scoop into a cup or bowl and snack on right away without the hassle of unwrapping individual pieces. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Cinnamon candies and black licorice
steps.content: Cinnamon candies and black licorice To please everyone who will be eating your candy salad, try to steer clear of candies with strong, distinct, or controversial flavors. For example, cinnamon candies, black licorice, and even some minty candies may not be popular with some guests, and they can also clash with the other fruity or chocolatey candies you’re including in your mix.

steps.title: Instruct each person to bring one type of candy to add to the bowl.
steps.content: Instruct each person to bring one type of candy to add to the bowl. Tell them to pick a bag of unwrapped (not individually wrapped) candies, and if you’ve chosen a flavor or color theme, tell them about this, too. If you’d like to participate in the viral TikTok trend, have everyone line up, then film as they each take turns introducing themselves and pouring the candy they brought into a large serving bowl. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Serve your candy salad in a large bowl with a spoon to scoop it out.
steps.content: Serve your candy salad in a large bowl with a spoon to scoop it out. A big popcorn or salad bowl and a regular serving spoon should work just fine, but if you want to get a bit fancy, consider getting a metal scoop (like you might see at a candy shop). Simply use the spoon or scoop to dole out a serving of candy salad into a smaller cup or bowl, then enjoy!

steps.title: Store leftover candy salad in an airtight container.
steps.content: Store leftover candy salad in an airtight container. Any glass or plastic food container with a lid should work perfectly for this. If stored properly, your candy salad should stay fresh for a few months—just make sure to give it a good stir every now and then to prevent the gummy candies from clumping together. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Candy salad is a mixture of various candies served in a large bowl.
steps.content: Candy salad is a mixture of various candies served in a large bowl. The process of making it involves adding a bunch of different unwrapped sweets into a big serving bowl and tossing them together like a salad, hence the name. [9] X Research source Candy salads are entirely customizable and can include any type of candy you like, but fruity and sour flavors are popular choices. For example, a standard candy salad may include Sour Patch Kids , Skittles , mini Starburst , gummy worms , gummy bears , and peach rings .

steps.title: Candy salad gained popularity as a viral trend on TikTok.
steps.content: Candy salad gained popularity as a viral trend on TikTok. Some videos show users making their own candy salad, and others show groups collaborating to make one giant bowl of candy salad. The trend is especially popular in settings like workplaces, classrooms, and nursing homes, with each person bringing their favorite candy to add to the mix. All the participants then line up and take turns introducing themselves and pouring their candy into the bowl. [10] X Research source For example, TikTok user @chelseybado posted a viral video of herself and her coworkers making a large bowl of candy salad, which garnered 28.3 million views and 3.3 million likes. Popular TikTok couple @joshandsav also made a post involving candy salad, but their video shows the process of them making the sweet treat themselves, rather than doing it with a group. User @addiemclarke_ has also posted several viral Tiktoks of herself making different types of candy salads, including pink candy salad , fall themed candy salad , and chocolate and peanut butter candy salad .
